(:action cut ; Cut an item into specified pieces
  :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?surface - surface)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?surface) (at ?item ?surface) (whole ?item))
  :effect (and (cut ?item) (not (whole ?item))

(:action set ; Set a condition or state change for a task
 :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object ?location - place ?state - state)
 :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (not (in ?resource ?state)) (condition ?resource ?location))
 :effect (and (in ?resource ?state) (not (condition ?resource ?location))

(:action add
  ; General action to add an item to a location and update its state
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?container - container ?condition - state)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?container) 
                     (at ?item ?origin) 
                     (state ?item ?condition))
  :effect (and (in ?item ?container) 
               (updated_state ?item ?condition))

(:action serve
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?location - location ?state_change - state ?resource - resource)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (not_completed ?resource) (prepared ?resource) (active ?state_change))
  :effect (and (served ?resource) (not (active ?state_change))
